New Records: Yordan Alvarez ties Hall of Fame slugger Jeff Bagwell for most three-homer games in Astros history.
Key Match Events: Yordan Alvarez hit three home runs in the game.
Spencer Arrighetti carried a no-hit bid into the eighth inning.
Jose Altuve stole home in the first inning.
Mauricio Dubón made a leaping catch to keep the no-hit bid alive in the seventh inning.
Houston Astros won the game 10-0 against the Philadelphia Phillies.
Post-Match Reflections: Houston manager Joe Espada praised Spencer Arrighetti's performance, calling it 'magnificent'.
Philadelphia Phillies manager Rob Thomson mentioned the team will decide whether to run Taijuan Walker out for his next start.
Taijuan Walker felt he made progress despite the loss.
Miscellaneous Highlights: It was the worst home shutout loss for the Phillies since August 10, 2017.
Houston Astros matched their season high with 18 hits.
